title: Author Schema
description: A schema to validate author data for the XIV Resource Registry project.

name.description: The name of the author or creator of the resource.

gh_id.description: The GitHub user ID of the author.

gh_name.description: The GitHub username of the author.

amazon_gift_card_url.description: The URL to the author's Amazon gift card page.

cash_app_url.description: The URL to the author's Cash App page.

discord_url.description: The URL to the author's Discord profile.

kofi_url.description: The URL to the author's Ko-fi page.

patreon_url.description: The URL to the author's Patreon page.

paypal_url.description: The URL to the author's PayPal page.

reddit_url.description: The URL to the author's Reddit profile.

telegram_url.description: The URL to the author's Telegram profile.

twitter_url.description: The URL to the author's Twitter profile.

website_url.description: The URL to the author's personal website.
